department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Procurement of a conventional lathe machine with delivery located in Quebec, Canada
description: As detailed in Annex A, the offeror is to provide a conventional lathe machine including delivery located in Quebec, Qc, Canada.
full_summary:
================================

**Title (English Title / French Title)**
---------------------------

**F7049-230288: Machining Lathe (F7049-230288 - Tour d'usinage)**

**Reference Number (Numéro de référence)**
--------------------------------------

WS4601469548-Doc4603195504

**Document Details**
-----------------

### Document Type (Type de document)
* Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions) – Competitive, open bidding (Concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Scope (Objectif)**
-----------------

The Public Works and Government Services (Canada) department, acting as agent for Fisheries and Oceans Canada- Canadian Coast Guard, invites bids for the acquisition of a conventional Lathe machine (tour d'usinage conventionnel). 

**Key Terms and Conditions**

*   Tender close date: July 18, 2024, 14:00:00
*   The machine is to be delivered to a location in Quebec, QC
*   This is a competitive bid
*   Lowest price submission will be selected

**Additional Background and Information**
--------------------------------

This acquisition is subject to the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://www.international.gc.ca/alongside-avec-nous/other-autres/trade-commerce/trade-commerce-agreements-agrements-commerce.aspx).

**Key Documents**
----------------

The documents required to participate in this tender can be found [here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20067804?extsite=MjAwNjc4MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) in English and French. 

**Contracting and Communication**
------------------------------

For any questions or issues with the tender please contact Stephen Phan at stephen.phan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Submissions**
--------------

Please note this tender has expired.
